explanation: [0-0] On a grayish-white land, a young boy in blue shorts, bare-chested and barefoot, is standing beside a water pump, holding the green handle of the pump with both hands. The lower part of the pump is black, with a green tank-like object on top. To his left, there is a low red brick fence, and in the distance, there are green trees.
[0-3] Then, the little boy in blue shorts turns the handle with effort, and the wheel on the right side of the pump starts to rotate.

[11-17] Then, a boy in a yellow shirt and blue jeans walks in from the left. He puts his left hand on the top of the pump and grabs the handle with his right hand, shaking his body and turning the handle quickly. Then he takes his right hand off the handle and presses his left hand on the top of the pump. The wheel on the right side of the pump rotates rapidly, while thick gray smoke comes out from the left side of the pump, and the pump starts to work. The little boy in blue shorts runs quickly to the right.
